name: heroku-docker-nginx-example
description: A barebones nginx installation using Docker

STREAMCODEC.value: -acodec aac -ac 1 -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -pix_fmt yuv420p -profile:v high -s 1280x720 -deinterlace -vcodec libx264 -preset veryfast -g 30 -r 25 -strict -2 -avoid_negative_ts make_zero -movflags  faststart -b:v 2500k -maxrate 2500k -bufsize 3000k
